description:
Point Guard of the Kouzu basketball club.
Hiiragi Hitonari is a very talented basketball player. he`s a mysterious and reserved figure, he finds it difficult to express his feelings.
He feels oppressed by the expectations of his father (famous basketball coach) and brother (famous basketball player), for this reason he joins the kouzu basketball club to demonstrate he`s able to be independent and free to do what he want to do. However, they`ll always try to encourage him to leave the team and play at higher levels.
He`s the worst rival and best friend of Akane Tachibana, another talented member of the kouzu
basketball club.
name: Hiiragi Hitonari
